name: MIDITransformType
desc: Values that specify the type of MIDI transformation.

items.name: case filterOut
items.desc: A transformation that filters out an event type.

items.name: case mapControl
items.desc: A transformation that changes a specified control number to a supplied parameter value.

items.name: case add
items.desc: A transform that adds a parameter value.

items.name: case scale
items.desc: A transform that multiplies by the specified parameter value.

items.name: case minValue
items.desc: A transform that sets the minimum value to the specified parameter value.

items.name: case maxValue
items.desc: A transform that sets the maximum value to the specified parameter value.

items.name: case mapValue
items.desc: A transform that maps one value to another.
